00039 #define USE_FN_PC1    // Use 1st preconditioner from Todd's code
00040                       // (alternate is whatever is in MsqHessian already)
00041 #undef  DO_STEEP_DESC // Jason's apparently broken hack to fall back to
00042                       // steepest descent search direction

00046 // Force std::vector to release allocated memory
00047 template <typename T>
00048 static inline void free_vector( std::vector<T>& v )
00049 {
00050   std::vector<T> temp;
00051   temp.swap( v );
00052 }

00060   : VertexMover( of ), PatchSetUser(true), mMemento(0)

00082 void TrustRegion::cleanup()
00083 { 
00084     // release Memento
00085   delete mMemento;
00086   mMemento = 0;
00087     // release temporary array memory
00088   mHess.clear();
00089   free_vector(mGrad);
00090   free_vector(wVect);
00091   free_vector(zVect);
00092   free_vector(dVect);
00093   free_vector(pVect);
00094   free_vector(rVect);
00095   free_vector(preCond);
00096 }

00098 static inline void negate( Vector3D* out, const Vector3D* in, size_t nn )
00099 {
00100   for (size_t i = 0; i < nn; ++i)
00101     out[i] = -in[i];
00102 }
00103 
00104 // Do v += s * x, where v and x are arrays of length n
00105 static inline void plus_eq_scaled( Vector3D* v, double s, const Vector3D* x, size_t n )
00106 {
00107   Vector3D* end = v + n;
00108   for (; v != end; ++v, ++x)
00109     *v += s * *x;
00110 }
00111 
00112 // Do v = s*v - x, where v and x are arrays of length n
00113 static inline void times_eq_minus( Vector3D* v, double s, const Vector3D* x, size_t n )
00114 {
00115   Vector3D* end = v + n;
00116   for (; v != end; ++v, ++x) {
00117     *v *= s;
00118     *v -= *x;
00119   }
00120 }
00121 
00122 void TrustRegion::compute_preconditioner( MsqError& err )
00123 {
00124 #ifndef USE_FN_PC1
00125   mHessian.calculate_preconditioner(err);
00126 #else
00127   double dia;
00128   preCond.resize( mHess.size() );
00129   for (size_t i = 0; i < mHess.size(); ++i) {
00130     const Matrix3D& m = *mHess.get_block(i,i);
00131     dia = m[0][0] + m[1][1] + m[2][2];
00132     preCond[i] = dia < DBL_EPSILON ? 1.0 : 1.0/dia;
00133   }
00134 #endif
00135 }
00136 
00137 void TrustRegion::apply_preconditioner( Vector3D* z, Vector3D* r, MsqError& err )
00138 {
00139 #ifndef USE_FN_PC1
00140   mHessian.apply_preconditioner( z, r, err );
00141 #else
00142   for (size_t i = 0; i < preCond.size(); ++i) 
00143     z[i] = preCond[i] * r[i];
00144 #endif
00145 }
00146 
00147 void TrustRegion::optimize_vertex_positions( PatchData& pd, MsqError& err )
00148 {
00149   TerminationCriterion& term = *get_inner_termination_criterion();
00150   OFEvaluator& func = get_objective_function_evaluator();
00151   
00152   const double cg_tol = 1e-2;
00153   const double eta_1  = 0.01;
00154   const double eta_2  = 0.90;
00155   const double tr_incr = 10;
00156   const double tr_decr_def = 0.25;
00157   const double tr_decr_undef = 0.25;
00158   const double tr_num_tol = 1e-6;
00159   const int max_cg_iter = 10000;
00160   
00161   double radius = 1000;         /* delta*delta */
00162 
00163  const int nn = pd.num_free_vertices();
00164   wVect.resize(nn); Vector3D* w = arrptr(wVect);
00165   zVect.resize(nn); Vector3D* z = arrptr(zVect);
00166   dVect.resize(nn); Vector3D* d = arrptr(dVect);
00167   pVect.resize(nn); Vector3D* p = arrptr(pVect);
00168   rVect.resize(nn); Vector3D* r = arrptr(rVect);
00169 
00170   double norm_r, norm_g;
00171   double alpha, beta, kappa;
00172   double rz, rzm1;
00173   double dMp, norm_d, norm_dp1, norm_p;
00174   double obj, objn;
00175 
00176   int cg_iter;
00177   bool valid;
00178 
00179   mHess.initialize( pd, err );  //hMesh(mesh);
00180   valid = func.update( pd, obj, mGrad, mHess, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00181   if (!valid) {
00182     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Initial objective function is not valid", MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
00183     return;
00184   }
00185   compute_preconditioner( err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00186   pd.recreate_vertices_memento( mMemento, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00187 
00188   while (!term.terminate() && (radius > 1e-20)) {
00189 
00190     norm_r = length_squared(arrptr(mGrad), nn);
00191     norm_g = sqrt(norm_r);
00192 
00193     memset(d, 0, 3*sizeof(double)*nn);
00194     memcpy(r, arrptr(mGrad), nn*sizeof(Vector3D)); //memcpy(r, mesh->g, 3*sizeof(double)*nn);
00195     norm_g *= cg_tol;
00196 
00197     apply_preconditioner( z, r, err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err); //prec->apply(z, r, prec, mesh);
00198     negate(p, z, nn);
00199     rz = inner(r, z, nn);
00200 
00201     dMp    = 0;
00202     norm_p = rz;
00203     norm_d = 0;
00204 
00205     cg_iter = 0;
00206     while ((sqrt(norm_r) > norm_g) && 
00207 #ifdef DO_STEEP_DESC
00208          (norm_d > tr_num_tol) && 
00209 #endif
00210          (cg_iter < max_cg_iter)) 
00211     {
00212       ++cg_iter;
00213 
00214       memset(w, 0, 3*sizeof(double)*nn);
00215       //matmul(w, mHess, p); //matmul(w, mesh, p);
00216       mHess.product( w, p );
00217 
00218       kappa = inner(p, w, nn);
00219       if (kappa <= 0.0) {
00220         alpha = (sqrt(dMp*dMp+norm_p*(radius-norm_d))-dMp)/norm_p;
00221         plus_eq_scaled( d, alpha, p, nn );
00222         break;
00223       }
00224 
00225       alpha = rz / kappa;
00226 
00227       norm_dp1 = norm_d + 2.0*alpha*dMp + alpha*alpha*norm_p;
00228       if (norm_dp1 >= radius) {
00229         alpha = (sqrt(dMp*dMp+norm_p*(radius-norm_d))-dMp)/norm_p;
00230         plus_eq_scaled( d, alpha, p, nn );
00231         break;
00232       }
00233 
00234       plus_eq_scaled( d, alpha, p, nn );
00235       plus_eq_scaled( r, alpha, w, nn );
00236       norm_r = length_squared(r, nn);
00237 
00238       apply_preconditioner( z, r, err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err); //prec->apply(z, r, prec, mesh);
00239 
00240       rzm1 = rz;
00241       rz = inner(r, z, nn);
00242       beta = rz / rzm1;
00243       times_eq_minus( p, beta, z, nn );
00244 
00245       dMp = beta*(dMp + alpha*norm_p);
00246       norm_p = rz + beta*beta*norm_p;
00247       norm_d = norm_dp1;
00248     }
00249 
00250 #ifdef DO_STEEP_DESC    
00251     if (norm_d <= tr_num_tol) {
00252       norm_g = length(arrptr(mGrad), nn);
00253       double ll = 1.0;
00254       if (norm_g < tr_num_tol)
00255         break;
00256       if (norm_g > radius)
00257         ll = radius / nurm_g;
00258       for (int i = 0; i < nn; ++i)
00259         d[i] = ll * mGrad[i];
00260     }
00261 #endif
00262 
00263     alpha = inner( arrptr(mGrad), d, nn ); // inner(mesh->g, d, nn);
00264 
00265     memset(p, 0, 3*sizeof(double)*nn);
00266     //matmul(p, mHess, d); //matmul(p, mesh, d);
00267     mHess.product( p, d );
00268     beta = 0.5*inner(p, d, nn);
00269     kappa = alpha + beta;
00270 
00271     /* Put the new point into the locations */
00272     pd.move_free_vertices_constrained( d, nn, 1.0, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00273 
00274     valid = func.evaluate( pd, objn, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err); 
00275     if (!valid) {
00276       /* Function not defined at trial point */
00277       radius *= tr_decr_undef;
00278       pd.set_to_vertices_memento( mMemento, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err); 
00279       continue;
00280     }
00281       
00282 
00283     if ((fabs(kappa) <= tr_num_tol) && (fabs(objn - obj) <= tr_num_tol)) {
00284       kappa = 1;
00285     }
00286     else {
00287       kappa = (objn - obj) / kappa;
00288     }
00289     
00290     if (kappa < eta_1) {
00291       /* Iterate is unacceptable */
00292       radius *= tr_decr_def;
00293       pd.set_to_vertices_memento( mMemento, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err); 
00294       continue;
00295     }
00296 
00297       /* Iterate is acceptable */
00298     if (kappa >= eta_2) {
00299       /* Iterate is a very good step, increase radius */
00300       radius *= tr_incr;
00301       if (radius > 1e20) {
00302         radius = 1e20;
00303       }
00304     }
00305 
00306     func.update( pd, obj, mGrad, mHess, err );
00307     compute_preconditioner( err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00308     pd.recreate_vertices_memento( mMemento, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00309 
00310     // checks stopping criterion 
00311     term.accumulate_patch( pd, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00312     term.accumulate_inner( pd, objn, arrptr(mGrad), err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00313   }
00314 }    
00315
